name: Dragcave Eggs Rarity Highlight
description:
Highlights eggs in the abandoned page according to their rarity; red is very common, orange is common, green is uncommon, and blue is rare.
*CURRENTLY NOT FUNCTIONING*
css:
/*@-moz-document url-prefix("http://dragcave.net/abandoned"), url-prefix("http://dragcave.net/")*/ 
/*Rare!*/
img[src$='images/zWGP.png'],
img[src$='images/OfxZ.png'],
img[src$='images/tx25.png'],
img[src$='images/Vzgx.png'],
img[src$='images/w89t.gif'],
img[src$='images/HsVd.gif']
{ background:cyan} 

/*Uncommon!*/
img[src$='images/V6J4.gif'],
img[src$='images/Ui7i.png'],
img[src$='images/YiBN.gif'],
img[src$='images/fgN3.gif'],
img[src$='images/GLLP.gif'],
img[src$='images/QuPA.gif'],
img[src$='images/7yNF.gif'],
img[src$='images/y2f4.gif'],
img[src$='images/Qfkk.png'],
img[src$='images/YK3F.png'],
img[src$='images/ha37.png'],
img[src$='images/sog5.png'],
img[src$='images/TeAi.gif'],
img[src$='images/iUHy.png'],
img[src$='images/2JOq.png'],
img[src$='images/u300.png'],
img[src$='images/KRRT.gif'],
img[src$='images/WLoM.gif'],
img[src$='images/6jnH.png'],
img[src$='images/baR7.png']
{ background:#79C143 }


/*Common!*/
img[src$='images/WRGz.png'],
img[src$='images/IDf7.gif'],
img[src$='images/EbvD.gif'],
img[src$='images/KXYB.gif'],
img[src$='images/Sd3r.png'],
img[src$='images/oD6e.gif'],
img[src$='images/UXmr.gif'],
img[src$='images/XtAq.gif'],
img[src$='images/CEJF.gif'],
img[src$='images/Xf6R.gif'],
img[src$='images/R9fK.png'],
img[src$='images/DNbn.gif'],
img[src$='images/hwiX.png'],
img[src$='images/WZx3.gif'],
img[src$='images/aoWe.gif'],
img[src$='images/C77L.gif'],
img[src$='images/EL8Z.gif'],
img[src$='images/qL9m.png'],
img[src$='images/JPBP.gif'],
img[src$='images/VC7y.gif'],
img[src$='images/xoGy.png'],
img[src$='image/dkfa.png'],
img[src$='image/K8E2.gif'],
img[src$='image/scAY.png'],
img[src$='image/NjWy.gif'],
img[src$='image/vh8g.gif']
{ background:orange }

/*Very Common!*/
img[src$='images/IZpJ.gif'],
img[src$='images/Kvfb.gif'],
img[src$='images/FhyE.gif'],
img[src$='images/iU3E.gif'],
img[src$='images/kT2J.gif'],
img[src$='images/WK0n.gif'],
img[src$='images/6wku.gif'],
img[src$='images/ZTSK.gif']
{ background:red }
